item.title: The Mysterious Death of Actress Divya Bharti
item.description: Divya Bharti was one of Bollywood’s most promising actresses in the early 1990s, known for her beauty, talent, and meteoric rise to fame. However, her life was tragically cut short at the young age of 19 under mysterious circumstances. On April 5, 1993, she reportedly fell from the balcony of her fifth-floor apartment in Mumbai and succumbed to her injuries. Despite an official verdict of ac
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K

item.title: The Shawshank Redemption Movie about Life, Hope and Freedom
item.description: Shawshank Redemption is one of the best movies ever made. Even today its stands above The Godfather movie on the IMDb top rated 250 movies. A must watch movie.
